DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Acupuncture Treat Spinal Pain
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct Daegu Catholic University Medical Center . Enrolled participant randomize two group : acupuncture treatment plus epidural block epidural block alone . This trial include treatment 3 week , follow 2 week . Participants acupuncture treatment three time per week epidural block per week . All examination treatment provide free charge . Compared epidural block group , acupuncture plus epidural block group give effectiveness alleviate pain cause lumbar spondylosis .
